channel.title: Tsuki Realm - Recruiting
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Tsuki Realm - Recruiting"

item.title: Re: Tsuki Realm - Recruiting
item.content:encoded:
Update yet again:

We now have 140 upgrades, the only ones we are missing is the Elemental Beacon and then the MajorKai. We have access to every part of the game as well, and we entice kaiju and do zombja maps as often as possible. Come join if you want some cookies and to have a bit of fun in the process :P

item.title: Re: Tsuki Realm - Recruiting
item.content:encoded:
Update on our progress.

Now we have defeated every kaiju, have 114 upgrades, are doing zombjas regularly with a few kaiju thrown in as well and have R00t access. We now have the Drain Amplifier and will have the Field Oscillator within a few days.

item.title: Re: Tsuki Realm - Recruiting
item.content:encoded:
The Sand Demon has been defeated.

Now all we need is to defeat the Nine Tailed Fox demon and we can get the Chaos Gate to begin R00t.

item.title: Tsuki Realm - Recruiting
item.content:encoded: The Immortal Realm Tsuki Village, the Village Hidden in the Moonlight is recruiting active players. We have 92 upgrades: including Zombjas. We are close to R00T access as well. We summon Kaijus whenever possible. Our leader Swan has most of the Kaiju Drops so we auction off the extra Kaiju Drop to Villagers using a very fair Kaiju Drop Bidding System using tickets earned by helping out the Village, Looping, or getting a certain number of attacks on a Kaiju.
